verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera vallabhā rādhā kṛṣṇa-prāṇa-dhana
tāṅhā vinu sukha-hetu nahe gopī-gaṇa

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; vallabhā—beloved; rādhā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; kṛṣṇa-prāṇa-dhana—the wealth of the life of Lord Kṛṣṇa; tāṅhā—Her; vinu—without; sukha-hetu—cause of happiness; nahe—are not; gopī-gaṇa—the gopīs.
translation: Rādhā is the beloved consort of Kṛṣṇa, and She is the wealth of His life. Without Her, the gopīs cannot give Him pleasure.
